Key Match Events: Shivam Dube hit an unbeaten 60 off 43 balls
Tilak Varma contributed with 26 off 22 balls
Rohit Sharma and Shubman Gill had an avoidable mix-up limiting Rohit's stay to two balls
Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran struggled in the powerplay
Nabi and Omarzai built a crucial partnership of 68 runs
Axar Patel was the standout bowler with figures of 4-0-23-2
Rahmat Shah made his T20 debut
India won the match comfortably in 17.3 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Shivam Dube expressed satisfaction with his performance
Team India's management praised the efforts of Dube and Varma
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Mohali
The match was delayed due to a flickering blue light around the sightscreen distracting Gurbaz
Yashasvi Jaiswal was unavailable due to a sore right groin
